thread.title: "I had an ear infection that was killing me": Calum Best explains snapping at CBB's Jedward
thread.title_full: "I had an ear infection that was killing me": Calum Best explains snapping at CBB's Jedward

author: Lara Martin
title: "I had an ear infection that was killing me": Calum Best explains snapping at CBB's Jedward
text:
Calum Best has revealed he had an ear infection in the Celebrity Big Brother house for the last ten days that affected his mood and temperament. 
The model was evicted from CBB house on Tuesday night, just three days before this series’ big finale on Friday. 
Speaking to Emma Willis, he admitted being “upset” to leave so close to the end but said he’d had a good experience overall. 
However, he also revealed viewers hadn’t seen the struggle he’d been through for nearly two weeks, battling a painful ear infection. Calum told Emma he'd had an ear infection that wasn't shown on screen (Photo: Channel 5) Calum leaving CBB on Tuesday night (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN.com) Read More When is the Celebrity Big Brother 2017 final? Date, time and all you need to know about the exciting finale 
Calum said he just wanted to sleep and get rid of the infection, which is why he snapped at Jedward while they were singing loudly in the house at bedtime and was a bit more irritable than usual lately. 
Talking about his mood change in the house, Calum, 35, said: “I think the whole experience was starting to drain me and I was exhausted by the past few days. 
“We had a task and people were telling me for the past two weeks they hadn’t seen me as I’d been so boring. 
"I couldn’t [tell them] that for the past eight to ten days I had an ear infection that was killing me and I wanted to sleep it off. They obviously don’t show those kind of things but it was wrecking me. Calum admitted he'd been snappy the past few days because of his ear pain (Photo: Channel 5) Calum had been suffering earache in the house (Photo: Channel 5) Calum said comments about him being boring had upset him (Photo: Channel 5) Read More "I'm upset to leave": Calum Best is tenth housemate evicted from Celebrity Big Brother 
“I felt if I wasn’t aired I wasn’t getting much time. So that started to frustrate me and play on my mind. 
"Jedward, bless them, they are so good in so many ways but at points when I’m trying to sleep at two in the morning and they’re singing at the top of their lungs….” 
Calum went on to say: “I don’t want to give anybody grief but there’s a few times you start saying… they enjoy themselves but I feel sometimes they don’t give that respect back and I think to live in a happy house there has to be mutual respect all around. Calum lost it in the house with Jedward (Photo: Channel 5) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
